# Marathon Kids

::: {.rmdnote} 

>**"Compare the means and correlations across trainers."**

:::

## About this data

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(datasauRus)
library(dplyr)

q1 <- datasaurus_dozen %>% 
  mutate(trainer = rep(1:13,rep(142,13))) %>% 
  select(trainer, x, y) %>% 
  rename(pre = x, post = y)
knitr::kable(head(q1), align = "ccc")


```

## More about this data

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
q2 <- q1  %>%  
  group_by(trainer) %>% 
  tally()
knitr::kable(q2, align = "ccc")
```
